HTMLElementAttachInternals.summary: The HTMLElement.attachInternals() method returns an object. This method allows a custom element to participate in HTML forms. The ElementInternals interface provides utilities for working with these elements in the same way you would work with any standard HTML form element, and also exposes the Accessibility Object Model to the element.

remarks.para:
-More capable form controls
-Creating custom form controls with ElementInternals
